title: MacBook
overview: The new MacBook delivers powerful performance with Intel Core 2 Duo processors, increased storage, and an ultra-portable design.
details: Powered by an Intel Core 2 Duo processor at speeds up to 2.16GHz.
Comes with 1GB memory standard and larger hard drive options.
Sleek, 1.08-inch-thin design built for portability and durability.
Built-in iSight camera for video calls, recordings, and fun photos.
Innovative MagSafe Power Adapter that detaches safely when pulled.
Wireless capabilities with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for seamless connectivity.

specifications.Connectivity: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, USB, MagSafe Power Adapter
